entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is described as crawling toward someone and realizing that this is not the Forbidden Forest.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who has been injured. His face is grayish-white, and he is bleeding from his left side.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another friend of Harry's who is also on her hands and knees next to Ron. She is described as already busy at Ron's sleeve, where the blood is wettest.

entities.name: cattermole
entities.description: A person whose appearance Ron is currently taking on due to the Polyjuice Potion. He is mentioned as a point of comparison for Ron's current state.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Ron's injury, as evidenced by his reaction to seeing Ron's condition.
Hermione is caring for Ron's injury, as shown by her actions of tearing open his shirt and laying bare his upper arm.
Harry and Hermione are working together to care for Ron's injury, as evidenced by their joint efforts to help him.
